procedures.name: Venipuncture
procedures.label: Blood Draw
procedures.description: Collection of venous blood samples for laboratory analysis, including pharmacokinetics (PK), pharmacodynamics (PD), hematology, clinical chemistry, serology, and genetic testing.

code.decode: Collection of venous blood by venipuncture

procedures.name: Urine Sample Collection
procedures.label: Urine Collection
procedures.description: Collection of urine for urinalysis, pregnancy testing, and drug screening.

procedures.name: Intravenous Insulin Infusion
procedures.label: IV Insulin Infusion
procedures.description: Procedure to induce hypoglycemia in a controlled setting using an intravenous insulin infusion.

procedures.name: Intramuscular Injection
procedures.label: IM Glucagon Injection
procedures.description: Administration of intramuscular glucagon (IMG) after reconstitution.

procedures.name: Vital Signs Measurement
procedures.label: Vital Signs
procedures.description: Measurement of supine blood pressure, pulse rate, and body temperature at specified time points.

procedures.name: Electrocardiogram
procedures.label: ECG
procedures.description: Recording of single and triplicate 12-lead electrocardiograms (ECGs) at specified time points.

procedures.name: Bedside Plasma Glucose Monitoring
procedures.label: Bedside PG Monitoring
procedures.description: Frequent monitoring of plasma glucose levels using a bedside device during hypoglycemia induction and post-treatment for safety.

procedures.name: Physical Examination
procedures.label: Physical Exam
procedures.description: Medical assessment of the patient's physical condition at screening.

procedures.name: Height and Weight Measurement
procedures.label: Height and Weight
procedures.description: Measurement of patient's height at screening and weight before procedures.

procedures.name: Nasal Inspection
procedures.label: Nasal Inspection
procedures.description: Visual inspection of the nasal passages before and after study treatment administration.

procedures.name: Injection-Site Assessment
procedures.label: Injection Site Assessment
procedures.description: Assessment of the injection site for patients receiving intramuscular glucagon (IMG).

procedures.name: Edinburgh Hypoglycemia Scale
procedures.label: Hypoglycemia Questionnaire
procedures.description: Administration of a questionnaire to evaluate the recovery from clinical symptoms of hypoglycemia.

procedures.name: Intravenous Glucose Administration
procedures.label: IV Glucose Rescue
procedures.description: Administration of intravenous (IV) glucose if the patient experiences signs and symptoms of severe hypoglycemia requiring intervention.

medicalDevices.name: Nasal Dosing Device
medicalDevices.label: Nasal Glucagon Device
medicalDevices.description: A user-friendly, single-use, nasal dosing device that delivers 3 mg glucagon powder (LY900018).

medicalDevices.name: Syringe and Needle
medicalDevices.label: IM Injection Kit
medicalDevices.description: Used for intramuscular (IM) injection of reconstituted glucagon powder (IMG).

medicalDevices.name: Bedside Glucose Meter
medicalDevices.label: Glucose Meter
medicalDevices.description: Device used for bedside plasma glucose (PG) monitoring for safety during the hypoglycemia induction procedure.

medicalDevices.name: 12-lead ECG Machine
medicalDevices.label: ECG Machine
medicalDevices.description: Device for recording single and triplicate 12-lead electrocardiograms.

medicalDevices.name: IV Infusion Setup
medicalDevices.label: IV Infusion Setup
medicalDevices.description: Equipment used for the intravenous (IV) infusion of insulin to induce hypoglycemia.

medicalDevices.name: Continuous Subcutaneous Insulin Infusion Pump
medicalDevices.label: CSII Pump
medicalDevices.description: An insulin pump used by some patients for their daily insulin therapy.
